If you are surfing the web, left-clicking on a link or button will take you to that page; try clicking the links on the mini-webpages below. When you are done, click next to move on.

Mini Web Site 1

This is just a mini-website within a web page. It has a link to take you to another page. Weblinks only need a single left-click to use. Why don't you try the link below?

Click this link...

Well Done!

Weblinks only require a single click but other things, as you are going to find out in the next section, need a double-click. This can sometimes be a little confusing, but don't worry, with practice, you'll get used to it.
